front.title: Virtual Subnet: A Scalable Data Center Network Architecture

abstract.t: This document proposes a new IP-only L2VPN solution which uses BGP/MPLS IP VPN technology [RFC4364] with some extensions, together with some other proven technologies including ARP proxy [RFC925][RFC1027] to provide a more scalable IP-only L2VPN services across a MPLS/IP backbone. This solution is intended to be a scalable data center network architecture which can be deployed today as an alternative to the spanning tree protocol bridge technology.
